Posts.Content: Hi  Im not sure if this is the right place  or not to ask  theses quesrions or not but thought  I'd give it a go. Im 23 and recently felt a lump on my left brest went to see my GP yesterday and after a quick examaniation he has arranged an urgent breast clinic appointment and alreaddy have the date for less then 2 weeks away. I could only feel one lump but my GP said he could feel a few which now has me really concerned. I have a parternal aunt  who suffered fron breast cancer but no other family history .  I just dont know what to expect at the appointment. How long it will take or if i should bring my partner with me or what is actually involved.  Thank you in advance
Posts.Title: Breast clinic appointment ????

Posts.Content: Thanks lesely for your  quick and in depth response my partner is the only one who knows about it as dont want to worry my parents or family untill i know more. Its just not like me to be worried  or anxious about something so it hit me a bit out of nowhere but im hopefully anxious over nothing and it will be fine.  Thanks again for your response
